instructions0: Select a Member State or an EFTA country to see the corresponding lifeline.
instructions1: Click on the images in the lifeline to get a comparison by country.
instructions2: The comparison is made through a bar chart and the selected country is marked in a clearer shade.
instructions4_part1: In order to sort by women or by men, rank by clicking on the arrows (
instructions4_part2: ) below the bar chart. To select data for only women or only men, uncheck/check the boxes.
